These rings and their quality amaze me. I love stainless steel too, it really doesn’t tarnish or fade, it can be extremely detailed. I’ve seen similar rings for 4x times the price and they’re silver but silver has its own set of things in caring for it it, cleaning it etc. I’ve been using stainless steel jewelry for years, always been happy. Stainless Steel just needs some soap and water and it shines! This is super heavy and solid, just a fantastic quality piece of jewelry! Sometimes these bigger rings fit kinda different on the same finger but opposite hands. It’s kinda big on my right pointer but fits perfect on my left pointer. It’s the finger and ring shape, design etc. It’s not a sizing issue from the company. Just play around with it and you’ll find your fit.  10/10
